${modID}:Attrition.NAME: Attrition

${modID}:Ceremonial_Blade.DESCRIPTION: Deal [#67D1A1]!${modID}:BaseDamage![] damage for the number of cards currently in hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Double_Down.NAME: Double_Down
${modID}:Double_Down.DESCRIPTION: Permanently gain a copy of one random card in your hand.

${modID}:Plague.NAME: Plague
${modID}:Plague.DESCRIPTION: When the inflicted enemy dies, apply it's curses to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Pride.DESCRIPTION: Gain max HP equal to the number of cards in hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Quick_Cut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [#67D1A1]!${modID}:MultiAttack![] times. NL Draw !M! cards.
